variables.description: Sets the desired minimum number of consistent reads of items (up to 1KB in                   size) per second for the specified table before Amazon DynamoDB balances the                   load.
variables.name: ReadCapacityUnits

variables.description: Sets the desired minimum number of consistent writes of items (up to 1KB in                   size) per second for the specified table before Amazon DynamoDB balances the                   load.
variables.name: WriteCapacityUnits
